ErrorMsg.value: No RAW Data Available For AllSourceCustomers

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_CustomerMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailCustomerLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWFIRSTNAME as RAW_FIRST_NAME,
RAWMIDDLENAME as RAW_MIDDLE_NAME,
RAWLASTNAME as RAW_LAST_NAME,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
DO_NOT_SELL,
NamePrefix as NAME_PREFIX,
NameSuffix as NAME_SUFFIX,
GenderCode as GENDER,
IsAshleyEmployee as IS_ASHLEY_EMPLOYEE,
LoadRetailCustomerID as LOAD_RETAIL_CUSTOMER_ID,
MarketingOwner as MARKETING_OWNER,
Channel,
FirstAcquisitionDate as FIRST_ACQUISITION_DATE,
FirstAcquisitionSource as FIRST_ACQUISITION_SOURCE,
FirstMarketingSmsSignupCode as FIRST_MKTG_SMS_SU_CODE,
FirstMarketingSmsSignupDate as FIRST_MKTG_SMS_SU_DATE,
FirstPurchaseChannel as FIRST_PURCHASE_CHANNEL,
LastMarketingSmsSignupCode as  LAST_MKTG_SMS_SU_CODE,
LastMarketingSmsSignupDate as  LAST_MKTG_SMS_SU_DATE,
LastOrderFulfilledDate as LAST_ORDER_FULFILLED_DATE,
LastOrderPlacedDate as LAST_ORDER_PLACED_DATE,
LastPurchaseChannel as LAST_PURCHASE_CHANNEL,
LastStoreShopped as LAST_STORE_SHOPPED,
LastStoreShoppedDate as LAST_STORE_SHOPPED_DATE,
LastStorePurchased as LAST_STORE_PURCHASED,
PreferredStoreID as PREFERRED_STORE_ID,
PreferredStoreChangeDate as PREFERRED_STORE_CHG_DATE,
ClosestStoreID as CLOSEST_STORE_ID,
CurrentMarketingRegion as CURRENT_MARKETING_REGION,
CurrentMarketingRegionChangeDate as CURRENT_MKTG_REG_CHG_DATE,
FirstOrderPlacedDate as FIRST_ORDER_PLACED_DATE,
LastAcquisitionSource as LAST_ACQUISITION_SOURCE,
LastEmailSignupDate as LAST_EMAIL_SU_DATE,
LastEmailSignupStoreID as LAST_EMAIL_SU_STORE_ID,
LastTechnicalSource as LAST_TECHNICAL_SOURCE,
LifetimeGrossDollars as LIFETIME_GROSS_DOLLARS,
LifetimeOrderCount as LIFETIME_ORDER_COUNT,
Companycode as Company_code,
RetailSystemNumber as RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUMBER
FROM RetailCustomer.RetailCustomersIncremental 
WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWEMAILADDRESS,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
IsPrimary,
LastClickDate,
LastOpenDate
FROM RetailCustomer.EmailAddressesIncremental 
WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWPHONENUMBER,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
IsPrimary
FROM RetailCustomer.PhoneNumbersIncremental
WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT B_SOURCEID,
RAWSTREETADDRESS,
RAWADDRESSLINE2,
RAWCITY,
RAWSTATEORPROVINCECODE,
RAWZIPOSTALCODE,
RAWCOUNTRYCODE,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATE,
B_UPDATOR,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDATE AS SRC_UPDATE,
FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
Timezone, 
IsPrimary,
ADDRESSTYPE
FROM RetailCustomer.AddressLocationsIncremental
WITH(NOLOCK)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 	B_PUBID,
		B_SOURCEID,
		B_CLASSNAME,
		B_CREDATE,
		B_UPDDATE,
		B_CREATOR,
		B_UPDATOR,
		START_DATE,
		END_DATE,
		FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
		FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
		LOAD_PROGRAM_ID
FROM RetailCustomer.DiscountProgramMembershipIncremental
WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT O.ORDER_ID,
       O.B_CLASSNAME,
       O.B_CREDATE,
       O.B_UPDDATE,
       O.B_CREATOR,
       O.B_UPDATOR,
       O.ORDER_DATE,
       O.ORDER_TYPE,
       O.SOURCE_ORDER_ID,
       O.FP_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
       O.FS_RETAIL_CUSTOMER,
       O.ORDER_STATUS
FROM [RetailCustomer].[OrdersIncremental] AS O
WITH(NOLOCK)
